description: Configuration to generate optimized molecules using recurrent neural networks with hill climbing algorithm.

target.title: Scoring functions with parameters
target.description: Scoring functions will be used to generate a score for SMILES.

batch_size.title: Batch Size
batch_size.description: Batch size used for the generative model sampling.

keep_top.title: Keep Top
keep_top.description: maximum length of a SMILES string

optimize_n_epochs.title: Optimize N Epochs
optimize_n_epochs.description: number of epochs for the optimization

max_len.title: Max Len
max_len.description: maximum length of a SMILES string

benchmark_num_samples.title: Benchmark Num Samples
benchmark_num_samples.description: number of molecules to generate from final model for the benchmark

random_start.title: Random Start
random_start.description: set to True to randomly choose list of SMILES for generating optimizied molecules
